  • Method Details

    • checkPos

      public boolean checkPos​(java.lang.String input, PlaySpace playSpace, java.lang.StringBuilder stringBuilder)
      This method parses the user's input just by checking if input.length() is greater or equal to 1
      Specified by:
      checkPos in interface MiniController
      Parameters:
      input - The input received from the user
      playSpace - The playspace where to search for the position(not needed)
      stringBuilder - A string placeholder to return the correct message to the player
      Returns:
      True if input.length() is greater or equal to 1, false elsewhere

    • getMessage

      public java.lang.String getMessage​(java.lang.String input)
      This method return the input
      Specified by:
      getMessage in interface MiniController
      Parameters:
      input - String passed from user
      Returns:
      The same input that was passed

    • getMessageGui

      public java.lang.String getMessageGui​(java.lang.String message)
      This method just calls the one above
      Specified by:
      getMessageGui in interface MiniController
      Parameters:
      message - String passed from user
      Returns:
      The result of getMessage(String)

    • checkPosGui

      public boolean checkPosGui​(java.lang.String input, PlaySpace playSpace, java.lang.StringBuilder stringBuilder)
      This method just calls the method checkPos
      Specified by:
      checkPosGui in interface MiniController
      Parameters:
      input - Same as checkPos(String, PlaySpace, StringBuilder)
      playSpace - Same as checkPos(String, PlaySpace, StringBuilder)
      stringBuilder - Same as checkPos(String, PlaySpace, StringBuilder)
      Returns:
      true if input.length() is greater or equal to 1, false elsewhere
